name: Ivana!
wishText: Meri jaan, it's your special day! Wooowwww, my wife is so pretty and I love her more than words can say! I hope you have the BEST birthday ever!!! You are my little blessing 💖
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Wishing you a long and happy life (with me of course lmaoooo) 🥳 🥳 🥳
text2: I was just going to text you...
text3: But then I realized I wanted to do more!
text5Content: You mean the world to me, bebiceee!!! 💖
outroText: Hope you liked my silly little website xD See you later, ljubavi! :D
replayText: If you want to see it again, just click this text!
